Html:
Hello radioman,

how to draw a Marker between 2 Geo coords? Routes makes my Form very slow, cause i need a lot of them.

If i draw marker, the 2nd points ends somewhere but not on the 2nd geo-coord.

In older Version:

        Dim TmpPoint_Drawing_End As GPoint = Form_Main.MainMap.FromLatLngToLocal(Me.EndPunkt)
        g.DrawLine(Pen, LocalPosition.X, LocalPosition.Y, TmpPoint_Drawing_End.X, TmpPoint_Drawing_End.Y)

is not working any more.

Any solution?

 

thx a lot
